snippet: Defensemen Scott Niedermayer and Chris Chelios and forward Brendan Shanahan were picked Tuesday for the Hockey Hall of Fame.
abstract: Defensemen Scott Niedermayer and Chris Chelios, along with forward Brendan Shanahan, are picked for the Hockey Hall of Fame; other hockey news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and ALLAN KREDA

lead_paragraph: Defensemen Scott Niedermayer and Chris Chelios and forward Brendan Shanahan were picked Tuesday for the Hockey Hall of Fame.

headline.main: Niedermayer, Chelios and Shanahan Are Hall Picks
headline.print_headline: Niedermayer and Chelios Among Hall Selections
